EmailTemplate.subject: TOMORROW : You’re invited! Learn What Employees Really Want From Their Next Employer
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Topic: Help Wanted – Best Practices for Hiring During the Labor Shortage Date: Tuesday, August 31, 2021 at 2:00 – 3:00 p.m. ET You’re invited to join us and Technomic’s Donna Hood Crecca, a veteran who’s consulted for the foodservice and drinks industries for nearly two decades. She’ll share insights into: - What matters to potential employees - How they view the restaurant industry - How they’re searching for jobs And she’ll cover strategies to handle the surge of new and returning customers that will drive long-term growth. Register and reserve your spot!
